concepts.DIASTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_12_DESC: A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.BODY_POSITION_14_DESC: Body position for procedure or blood pressure measurement
concepts.PULSE_15_DESC: Patient pulse rate, as measured with a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.BODY_MASS_INDEX_21_DESC:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a relationship between weight and height that is associated with body fat and health risk.

The equation is BMI = body weight in kilograms/height in meters squared.
concepts.ARTERIAL_BLOOD_OXYGEN_SATURATION_(PULSE_: Oxygen saturation, as measured from a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.SYSTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_11_DESC: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
